inclusion.criterion: Patient hospitalized for global heart failure or left ventricular failure in the Cardiology department of the GHPSJ between January 2016 and September 2018
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient transferred to another establishment on discharge from hospital (surgery, follow-up care, EPHAD, etc.)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
